tool_description: Creates product bundles by combining multiple products with specified quantities, bundle rules, and configuration options.

product_ids.description: Array of product IDs to include in the bundle

quantities.description: Array of quantities for each product in the same order as product_ids

bundle_type.description: Type of bundle: fixed, flexible, or customizable

min_selection.description: Minimum number of items customer must select (for flexible bundles)

max_selection.description: Maximum number of items customer can select (for flexible bundles)

substitution_allowed.description: Whether product substitutions are allowed in this bundle

discount_type.description: Type of discount: percentage, fixed_amount, or none

error_messages: Product ID not found: One or more product_ids do not exist in the catalog.
Mismatched arrays: product_ids and quantities arrays must have the same length.
Invalid bundle type: bundle_type must be one of [fixed, flexible, customizable].
Invalid quantity: All quantities must be positive integers.
Invalid selection range: min_selection must be less than max_selection for flexible bundles.
Invalid discount type: discount_type must be one of [percentage, fixed_amount, none].
Invalid discount value: discount_value must be non-negative and appropriate for the discount_type.
Invalid date range: start_date must be before end_date when both are specified.
Bundle name already exists: Choose a unique bundle_name.
usage: Provide bundle_name, arrays of product_ids and corresponding quantities, and bundle_type. Optionally configure selection limits, substitutions, discounts, and availability dates.

bundle_id.description: Unique identifier for the created bundle

total_products.description: Total number of individual products in the bundle

configuration_valid.description: Whether the bundle configuration is valid

estimated_value.description: Estimated total value of the bundle before discounts
